ly.img.android.pesdk.utils

Class TransparentJpeg

  • ly.img.android.pesdk.utils.TransparentJpeg

  • public class TransparentJpeg

    A lib that saves an ARGB Bitmap separated as RGB an Alpha Chanel in separate jpeg files.

    • Method Summary

        filename - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@334f34e8: the filename prefix

      • combineColorWithMask

                                          Bitmap maskBitmap)

        Load the RGB and ALPHA channel and combine them into one Bitmap.

        Parameters:
        rgbBitmap - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@30eb0753: RGB color informations ARGB_8888[COLOR + A=255]
        maskBitmap - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@31f59506: BW mask alpha informations ARGB_8888[(R=G=B + A=255)]
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@6efe31a1: the resulting bitmap in ARGB_8888
